text: Question how do I get more descript error messages when working with ftp? Someone once told me.
I’m using Transmit and trying to edit a fields.json file for a custom module and I can’t figure out where the problem is with my file.

I just keep getting `<http://ftp.hubapi.com|ftp.hubapi.com> [28]: Safe save upload failed, source file size was 5122 destination was 4781.
<http://ftp.hubapi.com|ftp.hubapi.com> [28]: Canceling…`
